javadoc:
{@link Task} that handles deleting {@link DomainFile files} and {@link DomainFolder folders} from the project.

This task will iterate all the files and folders specified by the user to weed out common problem issues (read-only files, checked-out files), ask the user to confirm, and then perform the actual delete operations.

This task will show a summary dialog if there were multiple files involved or any errors encountered.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a new task to delete the specified files and folders.

params.name: files
params.comment: - the DomainFile the user requested to be deleted, or null.

params.name: folders
params.comment: - the DomainFolder the user requested to be deleted, or null.

params.name: parentComponent
params.comment: - parent java awt component that will be parent of the message dialogs and such.

name: ProjectDataDeleteTask
comment:
Task that handles deleting DomainFile and DomainFolder
 from the project.
 
 This task will iterate all the files and folders specified by the user to weed out
 common problem issues (read-only files, checked-out files), ask the user to confirm,
 and then perform the actual delete operations.
 
 This task will show a summary dialog if there were multiple files involved or any errors
 encountered.
